definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan

sentences.english: Whatever he did, his love of ancient Chinese characters had never changed.
sentences.chinese: 但無論做什麼工作，他對於古漢字的熱愛未減分毫。

sentences.english: I lived in this little world of mine and am afraid to make it the least less.
sentences.chinese: 在我居住的這小小的世界我深怕使它更有分毫的減少。

sentences.english: Time will never cause our love to dimish.
sentences.chinese: 時光不會使我們的愛情稍減分毫。

sentences.english: Cai Wei once sold cigarettes, ice-cream and worked as pedicab driver. Whatever he did, his love of ancient Chinese characters had never changed.
sentences.chinese: 但無論做什麼工作，他對於古漢字的熱愛未減分毫。

sentences.english: Some of the most generous and romantic gifts cost nothing in terms of dollars and cents.
sentences.chinese: 有些最慷慨最浪漫的禮物並不需要破費分毫。

definition: one thread, one hair (idiom); a tiny bit/an iota
the slightest amount or degree/a bit
to not move a single jot (idiom)
no matter what/despite/to allow (sb to act arbitrarily)
